pic1_alt: Old looking manuscript cover. Treatise on the Scurvy. In Three Parts. Containing An Inquiry into the Nature, Caufes, and Cure, of that Difeafe. Together with A Critical and Chronological View of what has been published on the Subject. By James Lind, M.D. Physician to his Majesty's Royal Hospital at Haslar near Portsmouth, and Fellow of the Royal College of Physicians in Edinburgh. The Third edition, enlarged and improved. London. MDCCLXXII
